  {
    "file_path": "h2q_project/test_quaternion_ops.py",
    "content": "import pytest
import numpy as np
from h2q_project.quaternion_ops import quaternion_multiply, quaternion_conjugate, quaternion_norm, quaternion_normalize, quaternion_inverse


def test_quaternion_multiply():
    q1 = np.array([1, 0, 0, 0])
    q2 = np.array([0, 1, 0, 0])
    result = quaternion_multiply(q1, q2)
    expected = np.array([0, 1, 0, 0])
    assert np.allclose(result, expected)

    q1 = np.array([0, 1, 0, 0])
    q2 = np.array([0, 0, 1, 0])
    result = quaternion_multiply(q1, q2)
    expected = np.array([0, 0, 0, 1])
    assert np.allclose(result, expected)

    q1 = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
    q2 = np.array([5, 6, 7, 8])
    result = quaternion_multiply(q1, q2)
    expected = np.array([-60, 12, 30, 24])
    assert np.allclose(result, expected)


def test_quaternion_conjugate():
    q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
    result = quaternion_conjugate(q)
    expected = np.array([1, -2, -3, -4])
    assert np.allclose(result, expected)

    q = np.array([0, 0, 0, 0])
    result = quaternion_conjugate(q)
    expected = np.array([0, 0, 0, 0])
    assert np.allclose(result, expected)


def test_quaternion_norm():
    q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
    result = quaternion_norm(q)
    expected = np.sqrt(30)
    assert np.allclose(result, expected)

    q = np.array([0, 0, 0, 0])
    result = quaternion_norm(q)
    expected = 0.0
    assert np.allclose(result, expected)


def test_quaternion_normalize():
    q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
    result = quaternion_normalize(q)
    expected = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4]) / np.sqrt(30)
    assert np.allclose(result, expected)

    q = np.array([0, 0, 0, 0])
    with pytest.raises(ZeroDivisionError):
        quaternion_normalize(q)


def test_quaternion_inverse():
    q = np.array([1, 2, 3, 4])
    result = quaternion_inverse(q)
    expected = quaternion_conjugate(q) / quaternion_norm(q)**2
    assert np.allclose(result, expected)

    q = np.array([1, 0, 0, 0])
    result = quaternion_inverse(q)
    expected = np.array([1, 0, 0, 0])
    assert np.allclose(result, expected)

    q = np.array([0, 0, 0, 0])
    with pytest.raises(ZeroDivisionError):
        quaternion_inverse(q)"
  }
]
